Thanks yall...definitely not going back there. I told her that my face felt dry and tight and she said that it would have to be that way for now because she exfoliated my skin. My cheeks also felt hot to the touch. Ugh...

Is there anything I should do right now as far as damage control?? I put on some aveeno colloidal oatmeal cream because that was the only heavy cream I had on hand. That seemed to help my skin feel less tight and dry.
